page.shortlink: api objects string scanner object create function
page.description: Create a new string scanner object.
page.prototype: as P = Create as StringScanner(text as c)

argument.name: P
argument.description: A new scanner object that supports operations against Text.

argument.name: text
argument.description: The text that you want to process

page.discussion: The StringScanner.Create() function creates a new scanner object that supports operations against Text.
page.example: dim scanner as P dim txt as C txt = file.to_string("C:\Documents\AlphaFiveHelp\AlphaFiveHelp.hhc") scanner = stringscanner.create(txt)
